name: Anime Babes: Solitaire
description: Everybody's favourite single player game, and now you can pretend to be playing solitaire while you do it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: 800 x 600 resolution (technically playable at lower resolution, but difficult to see cards)
